turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi! I would like to order some coffee from Starbucks on Lee St. in Des Plaines, IL.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a Caffe Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like it on?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the largest size that they have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are several topping options, would you like any?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like some whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything I should leave out?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like as little sugar as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! And how many would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like just one of them, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like extra caffeine in it, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will have that done.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That would be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is being placed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please update me on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be available for pickup at the Starbucks on Lee St. and you will receive text messages for your receipt shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am so happy to help.
